1496582232357707778.text:
Back in DC to recap our trip overseas.
 
Our delegation was clear: we remain fully committed to unity w/ our European allies. We must address threats to democracy around the world, promote the role of diplomacy, & invest in equitable resources in the global fight against COVID. https://t.co/Vsas0zhaTp

1496332723782311941.text: However, given recent Russian escalation, it is important to stress that any new military deployments must be done in full compliance with Congress’ constitutional war powers and the provisions of the War Powers Resolution.

1496332722784067585.text: I am confident in President Biden’s repeated commitment to keep U.S. military personnel out of any conflict in Ukraine itself.

1496332721307762689.text: If Putin continues to choose aggression over diplomacy, then we must also be prepared to help lead a humanitarian effort to support Ukrainians fleeing the conflict.

1496332720057860096.text: While we work in coordination with our European allies to respond and impose targeted sanctions, we must continue to do all we can to de-escalate and utilize the full power of diplomacy to find a negotiated solution to this crisis.

1496332718082306049.text:
I strongly condemn Russia’s escalation of actions to destabilize Ukraine and further undermine its territorial sovereignty and call for the immediate retreat of all Russian military personnel from Ukraine, including Luhansk and Donetsk. 

(🧵1/5)

1337142629428056066.text: We're also working with @RepPressley to declare racism a national public health emergency & fix our broken & fundamentally racist public health system.

1337142628320751617.text: I introduced legislation that will do just that. My bill with @SenWarren invests billions in testing, tracing, & soon, vaccination, to be distributed at the community level with locally based & linguistically appropriate messengers.

1337142627242795008.text: If we’re going to solve this crisis, we need to build trust & provide equitable care. Trust will be key in distributing a COVID vaccine when it’s safe & ready with trusted messengers at the community level. We must also ensure that the vaccine is equitably distributed.

1337142626303299584.text: On top of that, I know the stress that racism can have on your health on a daily basis. Dealing each and every day with a system that’s stacked against you creates all kinds of underlying conditions that exacerbate health disparities as it relates to COVID.

1337142625158180864.text: I’ve experienced it firsthand – I often tell the story of my own mother being turned away from a hospital the day I was born & nearly dying because of discriminatory policies. The lack of quality & equitable care is a national crisis.

1337142623371407368.text: From the Tuskegee experiment to HIV/AIDS, there are justifiable reasons why Black and brown communities may have distrust in the government during public health crises. https://t.co/QDlRR3yMtJ

1337142622335459328.text: Black, Latinx, Asian & Indigenous people are all dying at disproportionate rates from this virus. That’s because our discriminatory & broken public health system has failed to serve people of color throughout our country’s history.

1337142621236568065.text: Soon we’ll have a COVID vaccine - but how do we get people to trust it after years of racism in our public health systems on top of what Trump has already done by setting up another system of distrust in this country? (THREAD)
